KnowledgeBase.Title: srandom
KnowledgeBase.HumanKeywords: random number generator range seed pseudo-random

Function.Description: The srandom function returns a pseudo-random number between zero and num.

Brief.Overview: The srandom function returns a pseudo-random number between zero and num.
Brief.Usage: The srandom function is used to produce a pseudo random number between zero and a specified number.

Argument.Name: num
Argument.Note: The top of the range of the pseudo random numbers to be generated.

Syntax.Return: Returns a pseudo random number between zero and num.
